plot: Luke lives the life of a millionaire until it is discovered that a mistake has been made and his inheritance belongs to someone else.
title: Great While It Lasted
plot_es: Luke lives the life of a millionaire until it is discovered that a mistake has been made and his inheritance belongs to someone else.
plot_en: Luke lives the life of a millionaire until it is discovered that a mistake has been made and his inheritance belongs to someone else.
